answers.author: Mark Abeles-Allison
answers.text:
Bayfield County, WI has been using NEOGOV for our job listing and interview system.  We just started with their performance evaluation module.  The system is very robust and flexibile.

answers.author: Michelle Flaherty
answers.text:
The City of Rockville implemented a Talent Management System that provides e-learning and electronic performance appraisals.  The vendor is Cornerstone OnDemand.


The City of Rockville implemented a Talent Management System that provides e-learning and electronic performance appraisals.  The vendor is Cornerstone OnDemand.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking into employee performance appraisals software systems.  They are interested in learning what other agencies are using.  Please send information re: your employee performance appraisal software.
Thank you.
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Employee Performance Appraisal Software
